title: S17 Ep95: Supernatural News/Parashare: Earth Spins Me Right Round, BABY Edition w/Beer City Bruiser
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Earth Spins Me Right Round, BABY Edition w/Beer City Bruiser
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Earth Spins Me Right Round, BABY Edition with Beer City Bruiser!!

Time keeps on slippin' (slippin'... slippin'...) into the future! (admit it, you sang that line) As the Earth is spinning faster and time is getting shorter! Tim and Bruiser are rushing  to get everything out and get the stories that matter to you!

This week,  The Earth is spinning faster and making our days go faster! Scientists play a couple of different games with us this week including, "Is it a Star System or is it my Lunch?" and "Cryptid or Kraft Macaroni dish?", and the next time someone says hold your breath, tell them science says you can blow it out your ass! (we'll explain that one at the end of the program too)

To learn more about Microdose Gummies go to Microdose.com and use code: darkness to get free shipping & 30% off your first order

Find out where Beer City Bruiser is holding his breath and needlepointing near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
